description: Single storey outbuilding to the rear garden of a semi detached house
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt the Drawing(s) No(s) to which this decision refers are as follows:

- Drawing 30 HG_P000 - Existing location and site plan
- Drawing 30 HG_P001 - Existing ground floor plan
- Drawing 30 HG_P011 - Existing front & rear elevations 
- Drawing 30 HG_P012 - Existing side elevations 
- Drawing 30 HG_P002 - Existing ground floor plan 
- Drawing 30 HG_P200 - Proposed location and site plan
- Drawing 30 HG_P201 - Proposed GF plan
- Drawing 30 HG_P211 - Proposed front & rear elevations 
- Drawing 30 HG_P212 - Proposed side elevations
- Drawing 30 HG_P202 - Proposed GF plan & Section A-A
